name: Psychic
description: You tap into a targetâ€™s mind, damaging their will to fight. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range, doing 2d8 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or higher, the target becomes confused.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
